edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.pam.tasks
Interface FeatureDetector

All Superinterfaces:
Activatible, java.util.concurrent.Callable<LidaTask>, FullyInitializable, Initializable, Learnable, LidaTask, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicDetector, BottomRightDetector, FeatureDetectorImpl, MultipleFeatureDetectorImpl, TopLeftDetector
public interface FeatureDetector
extends LidaTask

A process which detects a pattern (feature) in SensoryMemory content and excites PamNodes representing that pattern.

Author:
Javier Snaider
See Also:
FeatureDetectorImpl
